revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Mercku |model=M2A |revision=Node |series=AC1200 |asin= |price=59 |fcc_date=08/16/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Mcdinet |type=range extender, mesh node, |fcc_id=2AQOI-NODE, 2APR4-BEE |ic_id=24051-NODE |pwr_v=110-240 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=AC (direct) |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8197FS;RTL8197FS, H8H89P4 GI03I4; |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |fla1=128 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Realtek |ram1_model=RTL8197FS |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8197FS;RTL8197FS, H8H89P4 GI03I4; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi2_chip1_model=RTL8812BR;RTL8812BRH, I3X15P1 GI12; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none=true |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }}
:• '''867''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|M2 Bee Mesh Node}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.mercku.tech/products/bee/}} "R06-REV4" and "2018-05-21" are silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. {{See also|Mercku M2}} Mercku claims that this device has "1Gb" of flash. This seems unlikely and :is probably a copy/paste error from the [[Mercku M2]]. The ID of the flash chip is not legible in the FCC internal photos but it :is probably 8 or 16 GiB. __NOTOC__
